sequence:
Together with Souryuu

<size=45>Chapter 1: Be Careful What You Wish For</size>

scripts.say: My name is Souryuu. Commander, from now on, please request my permission in writing before doing anything weird.
Ever since we first met, I've always been drawn to her cold, dignified seriousness.
Thinking that she might be able to help increase my work efficiency, I appointed her as my secretary to see how things would go...
That morning, when I arrived at the office...
Good morning, Commander. I have already sorted all your documents, so please begin reviewing them.
Right away, I knew she had no intent on showing me any mercy...

options.content: Try to strike up some small talk with Souryuu.

scripts.say: Commander, please refrain from idle chatter while you're working. There's a lot to get through today.
... I'm getting a bit tired. Maybe it's time to take a break...
Commander, all my planes have already locked onto you.
During work hours, please make sure that you're actually working.
I heard the churning engines of aircraft circling above my head... How terrifying...
My attempts to strike up friendly conversation with Souryuu had backfired spectacularly.
Nevertheless, under her watchful eye, my productivity had undeniably skyrocketed.
Would I be able to convince her to be a little more easygoing if we were on better terms?
Commander, surely you aren't daydreaming about weird things while pretending to read your documents?
... I guess I have no choice but to focus on the work in front of me first.
